page.title: 15Felton By-Pass
page.content:
The By-Pass was opened in 1981.It was built because of the amount of traffic going through the village.It was very hard to cross the road before then. On Monday 1stJuly 1985 Class 3 did a traffic count to see how much traffic passed on the A1 in half an hour: On the A1 In & out of F. ********* ************** Vans 34 6 Lorries 40 0 Wagons 25 2 Cars 235 16 Motor bikes 2 1 Buses 9 0 Tractors 2 1 Cars&Caravans 4 0 Dormobiles 2 1
RESULTS: We found that 353 Vehicles would have gone through Felton before the By-Pass was built.
